plugin-data.name: Crop
plugin-data.description: Gives the option to crop images usefull for templating and optimize page speed.

url-help:
Optional parameters: [w{pixels}] width, [h{pixels}] height, [q{1-100}] quality, and [s] sharpen.
For example: crop/w400/h200/{image}, crop/w600/h600/q50/{image} or crop/s/{image}
default-width: The default image width in pixels
default-height: The default image height in pixels
please-support-me: If you enjoy my plugin, please support me by clicking the button below. Thank you!
